Title: RiaMVVM : MVVM Friendly WCF Ria Services
Description: Simple, light-weight, MVVM friendly access to WCF Ria Services. Written in C# for use with Silverlight 4.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Simple, light-weight, MVVM friendly access to WCF Ria Services. Written in C# for use with Silverlight 4.

If you have any good ideas feel free to let me know. I have no illusions that this is the greatest software ever written, and I may add some functionality from time to time.
